00074 #define COREDATA_MEMORY_ALLOCATORS(CLASS_TYPE) \
00075     public: \
00076         void* operator new(size_t size) { \
00077             assert(size == sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)); \
00078             (void)size; \
00079             using namespace sm::eod::memoryutils; \
00080             typedef boost::singleton_pool<eod_pool_tag, sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)> pool; \
00081             return pool::malloc(); \
00082         } \
00083         void* operator new(size_t size, int, const char*, int) { \
00084             assert(size == sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)); \
00085             (void)size; \
00086             using namespace sm::eod::memoryutils; \
00087             typedef boost::singleton_pool<eod_pool_tag, sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)> pool; \
00088             return pool::malloc(); \
00089         } \
00090         void operator delete(void* p) { \
00091             using namespace sm::eod::memoryutils; \
00092             typedef boost::singleton_pool<eod_pool_tag, sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)> pool; \
00093             pool::free(p); \
00094         } \
00095         void operator delete(void* p, int, const char *, int) { \
00096             using namespace sm::eod::memoryutils; \
00097             typedef boost::singleton_pool<eod_pool_tag, sizeof(CLASS_TYPE)> pool; \
00098             pool::free(p); \
00099         }
